scene_one: ^As is his way, he immediatelly falls in love with the first living being he sees.
^Io, Oceanus' granddaughter, was in his sights on this day.
^I'm a god and too busy to stalk mortals
scene_one_later: ^After following Io for a while, a thunderstorm is on the horizon
^I'm not getting wet for a mere mortal
^She is too beautiful to stop now
rain_shower: ^Zeus follows Io to a wide, open meadow and hides under a tree while she dances in the thunderstorm.
^After a while, Io falls asleep under rock, and Zeus wanders off home.
repeat_meeting: ^Days have passed and the only thing in Zeus' mind is seeing Io again.
^Zeus: Hera, my dear wife, I am going to go out for a while
io_outside: ^Zeus wanders around until he sees Io again
^Turn into a raincloud and seduce her with your rain.
rejection: ^Io takes one look at Zeus and laughs
^Io: I know your games, Zeus. Go home to your wife.
success: ^At some point, Zeus turns back into himself and they fall into the wet grass, giggling.
^Suddenly, something something Hera appears beyond the hill.
^Thinking quickly, turn Io into a large, white cow.
confrontation_with_hera: ^Zeus: But baby you know I love you
^Hera: I could never stay mad at you.
going_home: ^Zeus: Oh honey, you ruined my surprise, I was getting you this white cow!
